enchantInfo.yuoenchants:fire_immune: Consumable equipment can withstand all fire damage
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:war_to_war: It is possible to recover a certain amount of HP after killing a creature
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:blast_arrow: When the arrow hits the target, regret to produce an explosion (no fire, no damage to the terrain)
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:un_durable: Items will consume more durability when used
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:many_arrow: Shoot extra arrows when shooting arrows
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:lava_walker: The effect is similar to that of frost walker
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:insight: Increase the experience gained when digging and killing
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:leech: Restore a certain amount of health when killing a creature
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:melting: Burn the excavated cubes into burning products
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:bad_luck_of_the_: When fishing, ignited TNT will be caught
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:last_stand: Consume experience to offset damage while remaining half heart
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:lightning_damage: Lightning strikes around random creatures at fixed time intervals
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:thorns: Damage to wearer at fixed time interval
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:slow: Reduce the efficiency of using tools
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:behead: Increase the drop rate of withered heads, and players' heads can be dropped
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:rang_break: When the shortcut key is pressed and held, the range mining similar blocks
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:double_jump: You can jump several times (determined by enchantment level) and reset after landing. Enter cooling when the maximum number of jumps is reached
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:magnet: It can attract items and experiences in a certain range to the feet of players
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:water_walk: You can walk on water (or lava, but not recommended) (riding is also OK)
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:farmer: Right click the crop box to harvest mature crops within a certain range and accelerate the ripening of crops
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:fast_heal: Increase the recovery amount of each natural blood return
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:repulsion: When pulling the bow, it repels the entities within a certain range
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:rebound: When holding a shield to defend, it will repel the attacker and rebound some damage. Have a chance to completely defend this attack (consume endurance)
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:fire_shield: When holding a shield to defend, ignite the attacker
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:health_to_sacrif: There is a probability of dropping experience drops when killing creatures
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:diamond_drop: There is a probability that diamonds will fall when mining coal mines
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:instability: When attacking, mining and using items, you have a chance to throw them out (luck can reduce the probability)
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:un_looting: You have a chance not to drop experience and items after defeating creatures
enchantInfo.yuoenchants:un_luck: There is a probability that you will not drop experience and items after digging the square
yuoenchants.text.itemInfo.broken: Use on the anvil to eliminate level 1 enchantment penalty
yuoenchants.text.itemInfo.broken_super: Use on the anvil to eliminate all enchantment penalties
yuoenchants.text.itemInfo.small_exp_drip: Use to gain 5 points of experience
yuoenchants.text.itemInfo.big_exp_drip: Use to gain 10 points of experience
yuoenchants.text.blockInfo.diamond_anvil: This anvil is required to attach this module to the item. The maximum enchantment level is 256
advancements.yuoenchants.enchants.title: More enchantments of yuo
advancements.yuoenchants.mod_enchant_boo: Get any enchanting books in this module
advancements.yuoenchants.diamond_anvil.d: Make a diamond anvil to use the enchantment book of this module
advancements.yuoenchants.old_book.title: Enchantment enhancement
advancements.yuoenchants.broken_magic_pe: Trade high-level magic breaking beads with villagers
yuoenchants.message.login: §bWelcome to this module [more enchantments of yuo], question feedback§aClick here!
